page.title: 01Location: Kettering N.E.
page.content:
Parts of Kettering Avondale and Warkton Wards, the parishes of Warkton and Weekley, Boughton House and part of the Estate are within this area.
Consequently interesting contrasts are provided.
There are the two council house developments on either side of the A43 in the north-eastern part of the town.
The scene changes abruptly to one of meadowland and parkland as Boughton Estate is approached.
Encompassed by the Estate are the delightful picture-book villages of Warkton and Weekley with their stone and thatch cottages.
